  Retrieves the current status of Tailscale integration in the cluster.
  Use this data source to verify Tailscale is properly configured and to get
  information about the operator, API service exposure, and proxy pods.
  Example Usage
  
  data "hephaestus_tailscale_status" "current" {
    control_plane_ip = hephaestus_control_plane.primary.node_ip
    namespace        = "tailscale"
  
    depends_on = [hephaestus_tailscale.main]
  }
  
  # Assert operator is ready
  check "tailscale_healthy" {
    assert {
      condition     = data.hephaestus_tailscale_status.current.operator_ready
      error_message = "Tailscale operator is not ready"
    }
  }
  
  output "tailscale_api_ip" {
    value = data.hephaestus_tailscale_status.current.api_service_tailscale_ip
  }

# hephaestus_tailscale_status (Data Source)

Retrieves the current status of Tailscale integration in the cluster.

Use this data source to verify Tailscale is properly configured and to get
information about the operator, API service exposure, and proxy pods.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "hephaestus_tailscale_status" "current" {
  control_plane_ip = hephaestus_control_plane.primary.node_ip
  namespace        = "tailscale"

  depends_on = [hephaestus_tailscale.main]
}

# Assert operator is ready
check "tailscale_healthy" {
  assert {
    condition     = data.hephaestus_tailscale_status.current.operator_ready
    error_message = "Tailscale operator is not ready"
  }
}

output "tailscale_api_ip" {
  value = data.hephaestus_tailscale_status.current.api_service_tailscale_ip
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `control_plane_ip` (String) IP address of a control plane node

### Optional

- `namespace` (String) Tailscale namespace. Default: `tailscale`

### Read-Only

- `api_service_exists` (Boolean) Whether the kubernetes-api-tailscale service exists
- `api_service_tailscale_ip` (String) Tailscale IP of the API service proxy (if available)
- `devices` (Attributes List) Tailscale devices registered by the operator (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--devices))
- `helm_revision` (Number) Helm release revision number
- `helm_status` (String) Helm release status (deployed, failed, etc.)
- `id` (String) Data source identifier
- `operator_pod_ip` (String) IP address of the operator pod
- `operator_pod_name` (String) Name of the operator pod
- `operator_ready` (Boolean) Whether the Tailscale operator pod is ready
- `operator_version` (String) Installed operator version (from Helm)
- `proxy_pods` (Attributes List) List of Tailscale proxy pods managed by the operator (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--proxy_pods))

<a id="nestedatt--devices"></a>
### Nested Schema for `devices`

Read-Only:

- `hostname` (String) Tailscale hostname
- `tags` (String) Applied tags
- `tailscale_ip` (String) Tailscale IP address


<a id="nestedatt--proxy_pods"></a>
### Nested Schema for `proxy_pods`

Read-Only:

- `ip` (String) Pod IP address
- `name` (String) Pod name
- `node` (String) Node the pod is running on
- `parent_service` (String) Parent service this proxy is for
- `ready` (Boolean) Whether the pod is ready
